Description: Rare Military Russian (USSR) Militarian Chronograph 2 GChz Poljot Shturmanskie I bring to your attention Rare big militarian Chronograph 2-GChZ. In an excellent status. This fine Chronograph 2-GChZ is executed in Style of a watch of military pilots WW II. The Dial was Updated. These ancient watches have been well saved. On a dial and the mechanism there is a name of the manufacturer of watch. These watches were made in April, 1956. Watch are in an excellent status. Start, stop and dump on 0 are carried out by serial pressing the black button. Function of a chronograph works perfectly. These watches have been released for militarians. Actually watches it is much more beautiful than on a photo. The mechanism looks on much better than on a photo. Watches have been checked up by the watch-maker, greasing is replaced on new, the rate is updated. These watches are considered very rare. The new leather thong is applied on watches absolutely free of charge. These watches - elegant purchase for collectors, a good gift or for everyday use! 19 jewels S/n of the mechanism: 41164 Diameter of watch: 50 mm Diameter of watch with crown: 56 mm Diameter of dial: 41 mm Thickness of watch: 15 mm Band size: 22 mm Payment: I accept payment : PayPal Return policy: I guarantee you complete satisfaction with all my high quality watches.
